mapper.select:
SELECT t.id , t.diagnosis_code , t.diagnosis_name , t.bzdiagnosis_code, t.bzdiagnosis_name, t.remark, t.update_time, t.update_user
FROM t_diagnosticbz_mapping t
t.diagnosis_name like '%${diagnosisName}%'
and t.diagnosis_code like '%${diagnosisCode}%'
order by update_time desc,diagnosis_code

SELECT t.id , t.diagnosis_code , t.diagnosis_name , t.bzdiagnosis_code, t.bzdiagnosis_name, t.remark, to_char(t.update_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') update_time, t.update_user
FROM t_diagnosticbz_mapping t
order by t.update_time desc,t.diagnosis_code

SELECT t.id , t.diagnosis_code , t.diagnosis_name , t.bzdiagnosis_code, t.bzdiagnosis_name, t.remark, to_char(t.update_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') update_time, t.update_user, t.opt_type
FROM t_diagnosticbz_mapping_opt t
order by t.update_time desc,t.diagnosis_code
